description:
Colette gives a plaster head a tan, setting in motion a chain of unlikely misunderstandings. Colette becomes a bird.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanchigai Train / Hato to Ningyo to Pool Souji
Mistake Train / Doves, Mermaids, and Pool Cleaning
